text.headline: Anticipation for Domaine Lavagnac Golf
text.text:
Domaine Lavagnac will be a luxury golf resort development located in the South of France with an 18 hole golf course designed by Nicklaus Design. The project is being developed by French investors and international investors.

The Domaine Lavagnac golf course will be set in the heart of the Languedoc region, which is now formally part of the Occitanie region. The project is anticipated to feature classic design elements.

The Domaine Lavagnac resort will also feature a 5-star hotel with spa and tennis with other hospitality amenities, aiming to attract tourists, families and business travelers.

The Domaine Lavagnac project is an investment in the South of France, and is expected to create an economic boost with additional housing. The project will promote golf tourism in France and make the country a more attractive destination for international golfers.
